Holiday Parties & Events
Jon Pianki
2024-11-27T14:35:39-05:00
HOLIDAY PARTIES & COMPANY EVENTS!
Got a holiday party to plan for your company or group? Sure you could do a nice dinner and drinks. Or maybe a fun night of karaoke and white elephant gifts. But why not give your group a truly unique holiday party experience with snow tubing, ice skating, and real snow all without leaving sunny Florida!
A Snowcat Ridge Holiday Party Includes:
Private use of a festively decorated 500 square foot igloo for 2.5 hours, for up to 25 guests, with indoor and outdoor seating.
Optional Dining Plan with a variety of food & beverage menu options.
Unobstructed view of Snowy Slopes, perfect for taking in the Snowy Slopes music and light show.
Family-size s’mores kit with 8 full-size Hershey chocolate bars, 2 packs of graham crackers, large bag of marshmallows, and 4 roasting sticks.
Private firepit that is perfect for roasting s’mores.
Unlimited bottled water for all guests at
Refreshers: Beer, Wine & Drinks,
located next to the Eskimo Outpost.
Snow tubing session on Snowy Slopes and all-day access to the Arctic Igloo, Alpine Village, Santa’s Christmas Lane, and Crystal Ribbon until park closing.
Give your team an event they’ll be talking about for years! Whether you’re hosting a holiday party, award ceremony, or any other corporate event, Snowcat Ridge has a unique experience to fit your needs.
For groups of less than 25, purchase your discounted group admission tickets on our
admission tickets page
and purchase your private igloo rental on our
Eskimo Outpost page
.
For large groups of 25 or more, please complete the contact form below to receive a quote for group pricing.
